title: Emerging investigator series: In-depth chemical profiling of tire and artificial turf crumb rubber: aging, transformation products, and transport pathways
content:
Environ. Sci.: Processes Impacts, 2024, Accepted Manuscript
DOI: 10.1039/D4EM00326H, Paper

Madison H. McMinn, Ximin Hu, Katherine Poisson, Phillip Berger, Paola Pimentel, Xinwen Zhang, Pranali Ashara, Ella Greenfield, Jessica Eig, Zhenyu Tian
Crumb rubber generated from end-of-life tires (ELTs) pose a threat to environmental and human health based on their widespread use. Of particular concern is the use of ELT crumb rubber...
